title: A Billion Days of Earth
description: [Front Cover]"In a time beyond the farthest tomorrow when man has lost his planet to the others, comes Sheen, the Supreme One."(A Frederik Pohl Selection)[Back Cover]"Sheen: The Ego Eater.The Earth teemed with life of all kinds, and many besides man had intelligence and the gift of speech. But chaos ruled. And violence. And despair. Then, in the Valley of the Dead, Sheen first entered the world, and all of life would bend to the might of the Supreme One before the final push to the stars."
author: Doris Piserchia
